title: Hot Rod (1979)
description:
This one is a classic any fan of hot rods will want to see. It&#039;s all about the Munn&#039;s Root Beer Nationals at the "Bayland" drag strip in Freemont,Califorina, and every competitor who doesn&#039;t run a Munn&#039;s decal on their car is harrassed by the corrupt local cops. But you&#039;ll see enought interesting cars to make it worth your while.



A 1940 Willys with a Hemi, 1969 Cutlass, 1965 Plymouth (that they call a Dodge) Drag Racing and Street Racing. The plot is the buildup of the Willys for drag racing, you can almost smell the tire smoke!! Not much of an artistic movie but this is the movie that ALL gearheads need to see. This movie makes Smokey and the Bandit look like a love story.




	Gregg Henry	... 	Brian Edison
	Pernell Roberts	... 	Sheriff Marsden
	Robin Mattson	... 	Jenny
	Grant Goodeve	... 	Sonny Munn
	Robert Culp	... 	T.L. Munn
	Royce D. Applegate... 	Johnny Hurricane
	Topo Swope	... 	Sprout

	Ed Begley Jr.	... 	Clay
	Bruce M. Fischer... 	Cannonball


VHS To DVD (not availible on DVD)     NTSC     REGION FREE     95 MINUTES
